general_info.summary: This text appears to be a collection of navigation links and keywords related to a university, likely the National Institute of Information Technology (NIIT) or a similar institution, referred to as NIU. It covers various aspects such as university authorities, policies, academic schools, career opportunities, training and placement information, and administrative documents like annual reports and ordinances. The content also includes specific programs like Global MBA and mentions of collaborations and recognitions.
